Job.Command:
echo "Auger ID: $AUGER_ID" tar -xzf ${mg_dir}/MG_mini_BH.tar.gz cd MG_mini_BH/apBH cp ${mg_dir}/run_card_${ebeam}.dat Cards/run_card.dat set iseed = 1${num} set nevents=`grep nevent Cards/run_card.dat | awk '{print $1}'` set dz = `${param_dir}/dz.csh ${ebeam}` set ne = `${param_dir}/ne.csh ${ebeam}` set nbunches = 0
echo "Running $nevents events with seed $iseed" sed -i "s/.*nevents/$nevents = nevents/" Cards/run_card.dat sed -i "s/.*iseed/$iseed = iseed/" Cards/run_card.dat set workdir="$PBS_O_WORKDIR" setenv PBS_O_WORKDIR "" ./bin/generate_events 0 BH setenv PBS_O_WORKDIR "$workdir" set nbunches=`/u/group/hps/production/mc/MadGraph/nbunches.csh $dz $ne Events/BH_unweighted_events.lhe.gz` echo "Enough tridents for $nbunches bunches" if ( $nevents == 500000 ) then @ iseed = $iseed + 1000000 if ( $iseed < 0 ) then rm Events/* exit 1 endif else @ nevents = 2 * $nevents if ( $nevents > 500000 ) then @ nevents = 500000 endif endif end
